MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL67 postcode area of Cemaes Bay, affecting properties in Maes Cynfor, High Street, Victoria Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.20am. Our emergency response team are currently onsite carrying out investigations on the overhead network and will commence repairs once the fault is identified. We will get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12noon. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.45am on 7th of Nov 2020.
